General.Name: Telia Lietuva AB
General.Description: Telia Lietuva, AB provides telecommunications, information technology (IT), and television (TV) services and solutions to business and residential customers in the Republic of Lithuania. It offers voice telephony, broadband internet access, data communication, network capacity, digital television, mobile and fixed networks, and customer care services. The company also provides virtual private network, data center, SAP hosting, cloud computing, cyber security, telemetry, IT systems and infrastructure, computerized workplace management, and IT solutions. In addition, it provides collocation, backup, voice termination, and transit services, as well as installation of temporary telephone lines and internet services. Further, the company sells equipment, including phones, gaming consoles, computers, conference equipment, printers, and other smart devices. The company was formerly known as Teo LT, AB and changed its name to Telia Lietuva, AB in February 2017. The company was incorporated in 1992 and is headquartered in Vilnius, Lithuania. Telia Lietuva, AB is a subsidiary of Telia Company AB.
